content: BTC MASSGOD EDITIONWhat is Discord DM Marketing?We send the message you want through our accounts with a private message to the members on the target server. You reach the customer directly.🔰 Discord DM marketing service will never harm your server,🔰 With the special OVH proxy structure we use, all messages reach the destination directly.
